channel.title: Jagex sueing private server?help me understand this
channel.description: So i wanted to start up my own private sever but some of my friends on rs are telling me tht u can get sued for a lot of $.i went and searched the internet and found tht u cant(http://gameolosophy.com/games/online/runescape/runescape-private-servers-legal-or-not/) but some assholes are reporting private severs to jagexs(http://www.youtube.com/user/WelchDrew) so im not sure whats up can any1 help me understand this

item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern

@drubrkletern wrote:

im just renacting what happened in that message jagex sent to mopar
with 1337 talk

item.source: Jagex sueing private server?help me understand this

item.title: Jagex sueing private server?help me understand this
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Wouldn’t it be easier to claim:

Understanding that several parts of the source which is currently being implemented in the server you are playing and most of the client and cache you are using to play it with. [Insert Team Name/Community Name] recognizes JaGeX Gaming Co. holds copyrights to these files; However, under (whatever Free Use Bill thing/Internet Free Usage constitutional right [hoping that you are developing under United States laws]) we hold the ability to use these files to develop completely original content in which alters the game in such a way that it [the server being developed] does not represent RuneScape and JaGeX at all and does not badger on the company nor attempt to degrade the companies’ game. We, [the team], claim as well, that we have no ties what-so-ever to the gaming company (this requires you to stop playing RuneScape until you shut down your server and that your TOS includes that no one should be playing RuneScape faithfully while playing your server.) and it’s game. We at [blah blah.com/net/org] do not charge money for special features or items within [the server name] in order to make money from this altered version. (This does require you to actually have money to spend on your server if you use a VPS to run it) We [the team name, site name, or w/e] as JAVA language programmers use the source for learning and enjoyment and in no way intent to insult JaGeX and Co.

It could be created better and made longer as well. It basically gives JaGeX the credit it deserves for certain parts of the source/client/cache and then provides certainty that you are using the source for learning and for fun.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex sueing private server?help me understand this
item.dc:creator: @mod_cody mod cody
item.description:
@mod_cody wrote:

Here I’ll post it…

Src: http://runescape.com/terms/terms.ws

Intellectual property rights
Jagex®, RuneScape® and FunOrb® are registered trade marks of Jagex Limited in the United Kingdom, the United States and other countries.

You must not reverse-engineer, decompile or modify any Jagex Product client software in any way (except to the extent allowed by applicable law). You must not use a modified/customised version of the client software or attempt to sub-license it. You must not create or provide any other means by which any Jagex Product may be played by others (including, without limitation, replacement or modified client/server software, server emulators).

Materials (including without limit all information, software, data, text, photographs, graphics, sound and video) placed on any Jagex Product by us or on our behalf are protected by copyright and other intellectual property rights of ourselves or our business partners / suppliers / advertisers. You may not use these materials or any Jagex Product except in accordance with these terms and conditions and for personal (i.e. non-commercial) use only.

You agree that all intellectual property or other rights in any game character, account and items are and will remain our property.

By posting chat or other materials on any Jagex Product, you grant us a non-exclusive, perpetual, worldwide, royalty free, worldwide license to use and/or modify such materials on any Jagex Product as we see fit.

You agree that by submitting any material of any kind to us for any purpose connected with any Jagex Product (non-exhaustive examples are suggestions and ideas for any game or contributions to any Gallery page), you are giving us a non-exclusive, perpetual, worldwide, royalty-free license to use and/or modify the submitted materials as we see fit. You agree to waive any moral rights to the extent permitted by law and that you will not withdraw the submission or attempt to make a charge for its use. Furthermore you guarantee that you are the exclusive copyright holder in relation to the submission and that the submission in no way breaches the rights of any other person or entity.

Read full topic

@Rixxx wrote:

Jagex Games Studio

Terms & Conditions - Jagex

Dozens of positions available across multiple game projects. Whether you want to be part of the Guinness World Record-holding MMO RuneScape, help shape our upcoming projects or work on one of our compelling unannounced titles, you'll find a world of...

I advise you all read the part about intellectual property rights.

Jagex®, RuneScape® and FunOrb® are registered trade marks of Jagex Limited in the United Kingdom, the United States and other countries.

You must not reverse-engineer, decompile or modify any Jagex Product client software in any way (except to the extent allowed by applicable law). You must not use a modified/customised version of the client software or attempt to sub-license it. You must not create or provide any other means by which any Jagex Product may be played by others (including, without limitation, replacement or modified client/server software, server emulators).

item.source: Jagex sueing private server?help me understand this

item.title: Jagex sueing private server?help me understand this
item.dc:creator: @mod_cody mod cody
item.description:
@mod_cody wrote:

[quote=“DivineSouls, post:4, topic:363684”][quote author=Spades link=topic=459929.msg3364938#msg3364938 date=1286693629]
The Server is not illegal. The clients/cache are illegal.
[/quote]

He said it 100% correct. As for people reporting private servers. They are bitches of jagex, who hope to have a crown next to there name someday, they can keep dreaming next to here Mark Gerhard stuffed animal. Besides the chances of your server being reported are pretty small. Why pick yours out of the 1000’s out there?[/quote]

I <3 this dude ^

Read full topic
item.source: Jagex sueing private server?help me understand this

item.title: Jagex sueing private server?help me understand this
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:6, topic:363684”][quote author=Rixxx link=topic=459929.msg3364955#msg3364955 date=1286696760]

The Server is not illegal. The clients/cache are illegal.

winterLove bases with the Stream class are illegal.
[/quote]

Jagex sues people for copyright infringement. They wrote the Clients and made the Cache, us using it and claiming it as our own, that is illegal. So if I made a server and said it is for learning purposes only, kept “Jagex” at the top and put down “This is a modified version of 317, 377, 459, 477, 508, 525, 564, 614, ect. RuneScape based Client. I don’t claim the rights to this in any way shape or form. All rights reserved for Jagex Ltd. for creating this client/cache.” I don’t think they can technically sue you. But for servers selling items and offering members items/areas, that is Jagex’s cache that you sell pixels for. Then they have every right in the world to sue you. If you don’t sell items/members/objects/commands/areas. I don’t see a reason they can sue you.[/quote]No. Modifying their client is strictly against their terms of service and hosting that modified client would infringe their copyright.

Read full topic
item.source: Jagex sueing private server?help me understand this

item.title: Jagex sueing private server?help me understand this
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Easy way out send jagex a pm with a link to your site, saying THERE IS NO RSPS PRIVATE SERVER RELATED STUFF AT PROJECTSCAPE.TK OR! PROJECTSCAPE.SMFFORFREE4.COM!

They will never look at your site the same way again.

Read full topic
item.source: Jagex sueing private server?help me understand this

item.title: Jagex sueing private server?help me understand this
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Rixxx, post:7, topic:363684”][quote author=Spades link=topic=459929.msg3364994#msg3364994 date=1286701435]

The Server is not illegal. The clients/cache are illegal.

winterLove bases with the Stream class are illegal.

Jagex sues people for copyright infringement. They wrote the Clients and made the Cache, us using it and claiming it as our own, that is illegal. So if I made a server and said it is for learning purposes only, kept “Jagex” at the top and put down “This is a modified version of 317, 377, 459, 477, 508, 525, 564, 614, ect. RuneScape based Client. I don’t claim the rights to this in any way shape or form. All rights reserved for Jagex Ltd. for creating this client/cache.” I don’t think they can technically sue you. But for servers selling items and offering members items/areas, that is Jagex’s cache that you sell pixels for. Then they have every right in the world to sue you. If you don’t sell items/members/objects/commands/areas. I don’t see a reason they can sue you.
[/quote]
The Stream class in winterLove bases were from Jagex’s client.[/quote]Ye It was.

Read full topic

[quote=“Rixxx, post:5, topic:363684”][quote author=Spades link=topic=459929.msg3364938#msg3364938 date=1286693629]
The Server is not illegal. The clients/cache are illegal.
[/quote]
winterLove bases with the Stream class are illegal.[/quote]

Jagex sues people for copyright infringement. They wrote the Clients and made the Cache, us using it and claiming it as our own, that is illegal. So if I made a server and said it is for learning purposes only, kept “Jagex” at the top and put down “This is a modified version of 317, 377, 459, 477, 508, 525, 564, 614, ect. RuneScape based Client. I don’t claim the rights to this in any way shape or form. All rights reserved for Jagex Ltd. for creating this client/cache.” I don’t think they can technically sue you. But for servers selling items and offering members items/areas, that is Jagex’s cache that you sell pixels for. Then they have every right in the world to sue you.
